version_description: Fix a bug that cause a mission can not be completed sometimes.
Fix a bug that cause a mission can not be completed sometimes.

***Christmas is around corner***
We made a special update for Christmas！
- Christmas elements added，preparing festive decorations and events!
- Level difficulty adjusted
- New game mode added, get more fun in new mode
- Game experience improved
Merry Christmas and Happy New Year!

We constantly strive to make our games better, thanks for providing us a rating and review.

More surprises are waiting for you
Best Wish, Happy New Year ! ! !

”Hello there”~ The best friendly update is coming!

- Adjust level difficulty&tower value....
- We remade the Skill No.1 of Sam，it looks cool and technical now, please pick it up!
- Perfectly fit iPhone X, enjoy your big screen~

****** Next super update is coming soon in the end of Jan *********
*********** The new levels will be waiting for you!!!! *************
******* Ghost Town Defense awaits you to adventure *********

* * * * * * * The ghost army is coming! * * * * * * *
******Come on, Heroes!!! Update the Gift-Package******

1. Add "Daily Check-in system" .
2. New function: "iCloud Storage". Save game progress and synchronize multiple devices!
（▲Note: Please ensure that iCloud is Enabled)

Come on and fight against the ghost Boss!

* * * * * * * * NEW UPDATE! * * * * * * * * *
1. Have you seen TD game with a visual joystick? Easier to control and easier to battle!
2. A new ghost army is coming again! More levels, more boss and more challenges!
3. Add Talent System and Rune System, create your unique strategy!
4. Add Protect Mode and Pass Mode. Protect your city, defeat the enemy!

Come on and fight against the evil enemy!
